sentences.english: Stage I. Transverse fracture of medial malleolus or rupture of deltoid ligament.
sentences.chinese: 度内踝的横行骨折或三角韧带断裂。

sentences.english: The decending branch was anastomosed with the anterior medial malleolar artery.
sentences.chinese: 降支下行与内踝前动脉吻合。

sentences.english: Objective To study the curative effect of internal malleolus fracture treated with absorbable screws.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨可吸收螺钉治疗单纯内踝骨折的临床疗效。

sentences.english: The short oblique fibular fracture is high and the medial malleolar fracture is transverse.
sentences.chinese: 腓骨短斜形骨折高位，内踝骨折为横行。

sentences.english: Stage I. Rupture of deltoid ligament or avulsion of medial malleolus.
sentences.chinese: 度三角韧带断裂或内踝撕脱骨折。

definition: popliteal (anatomy)/hollow at the back of the knee
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
metacarpal bone (long bones in the hand and feet)
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
